A.description: For the letter A, close your fist with the thumb on the side of the index finger.

B.description: For the letter B, extend your fingers upwards with the thumb crossed in front of your palm.

C.description: For the letter C, curve your fingers and thumb to form the shape of the letter C.

D.description: For the letter D, hold up your index finger while the other fingers touch the thumb.

E.description: For the letter E, curl your fingers into your palm with the thumb resting on the tips.

F.description: For the letter F, touch your thumb and index finger together, forming a circle, with the other fingers extended.

G.description: For the letter G, hold your index finger and thumb parallel, pointing to the side.

H.description: For the letter H, extend your index and middle finger horizontally, with the thumb supporting the others.

I.description: For the letter I, hold your pinky finger straight up with the other fingers curled into the palm.

J.description: For the letter J, start with the I hand shape, then move your pinky finger in a J-shaped motion.

K.description: For the letter K, extend your index and middle finger while the thumb supports the middle finger.

L.description: For the letter L, extend your thumb and index finger to form an L shape.

M.description: For the letter M, place your thumb between your pinky and ring fingers while the other fingers fold over.

N.description: For the letter N, place your thumb between your ring and middle fingers while the other fingers fold over.

O.description: For the letter O, form an O shape by bringing your fingers and thumb together in a circular shape.

P.description: For the letter P, form the K sign but point it downward.

Q.description: For the letter Q, form the G sign but point it downward.

R.description: For the letter R, cross your index and middle fingers while keeping the others folded.

S.description: For the letter S, make a fist with your thumb across the front of your fingers.

T.description: For the letter T, place your thumb between your index and middle fingers, creating a fist.

U.description: For the letter U, extend your index and middle fingers upward together, keeping them close.

V.description: For the letter V, extend your index and middle fingers apart to form a V shape.

W.description: For the letter W, extend your index, middle, and ring fingers while the thumb and pinky stay folded.

X.description: For the letter X, curl your index finger to resemble a hook, with the other fingers folded.

Y.description: For the letter Y, extend your thumb and pinky finger while keeping the other fingers folded.

Z.description: For the letter Z, trace the shape of a Z in the air using your index finger.
